trans-unit.source: Azure AD Reporting: Getting started
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Reporting: Getting started

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Reporting: Getting started
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Reporting: Getting started

trans-unit.source: Getting started with Azure AD Reporting
trans-unit.target: Getting started with Azure AD Reporting

trans-unit.source: What it is
trans-unit.target: What it is

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory includes security, activity, and audit reports for your directory.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory includes security, activity, and audit reports for your directory.

trans-unit.source: Here's a list of the reports included:
trans-unit.target: Here's a list of the reports included:

trans-unit.source: Security reports
trans-unit.target: Security reports

trans-unit.source: Sign ins from unknown sources
trans-unit.target: Sign ins from unknown sources

trans-unit.source: Sign ins after multiple failures
trans-unit.target: Sign ins after multiple failures

trans-unit.source: Sign ins from multiple geographies
trans-unit.target: Sign ins from multiple geographies

trans-unit.source: Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity
trans-unit.target: Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity

trans-unit.source: Irregular sign in activity
trans-unit.target: Irregular sign in activity

trans-unit.source: Sign ins from possibly infected devices
trans-unit.target: Sign ins from possibly infected devices

trans-unit.source: Users with anomalous sign in activity
trans-unit.target: Users with anomalous sign in activity

trans-unit.source: Activity reports
trans-unit.target: Activity reports

trans-unit.source: Application usage: summary
trans-unit.target: Application usage: summary

trans-unit.source: Application usage: detailed
trans-unit.target: Application usage: detailed

trans-unit.source: Application dashboard
trans-unit.target: Application dashboard

trans-unit.source: Account provisioning errors
trans-unit.target: Account provisioning errors

trans-unit.source: Individual user devices
trans-unit.target: Individual user devices

trans-unit.source: Individual user Activity
trans-unit.target: Individual user Activity

trans-unit.source: Groups activity report
trans-unit.target: Groups activity report

trans-unit.source: Password Reset Registration Activity Report
trans-unit.target: Password Reset Registration Activity Report

trans-unit.source: Password reset activity
trans-unit.target: Password reset activity

trans-unit.source: Audit reports
trans-unit.target: Audit reports

trans-unit.source: Directory audit report
trans-unit.target: Directory audit report

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] For more documentation on Azure AD Reporting, check out [View your access and usage reports](active-directory-view-access-usage-reports.md).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] For more documentation on Azure AD Reporting, check out [View your access and usage reports](active-directory-view-access-usage-reports.md).

trans-unit.source: How it works
trans-unit.target: How it works

trans-unit.source: Reporting pipeline
trans-unit.target: Reporting pipeline

trans-unit.source: The reporting pipeline consists of three main steps.
trans-unit.target: The reporting pipeline consists of three main steps.

trans-unit.source: Every time a user signs in, or an authentication is made, the following happens:
trans-unit.target: Every time a user signs in, or an authentication is made, the following happens:

trans-unit.source: First, the user is authenticated (successfully or unsuccessfully), and the result is stored in the Azure Active Directory service databases.
trans-unit.target: First, the user is authenticated (successfully or unsuccessfully), and the result is stored in the Azure Active Directory service databases.

trans-unit.source: At regular intervals, all recent sign ins are processed.
trans-unit.target: At regular intervals, all recent sign ins are processed.

trans-unit.source: At this point, our security and anomalous activity algorithms are searching all recent sign ins for suspicious activity.
trans-unit.target: At this point, our security and anomalous activity algorithms are searching all recent sign ins for suspicious activity.

trans-unit.source: After processing, the reports are written, cached, and served in the Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: After processing, the reports are written, cached, and served in the Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Report generation times
trans-unit.target: Report generation times

trans-unit.source: Due to the large volume of authentications and sign ins processed by the Azure AD platform, the most recent sign ins processed are, on average, one hour old.
trans-unit.target: Due to the large volume of authentications and sign ins processed by the Azure AD platform, the most recent sign ins processed are, on average, one hour old.

trans-unit.source: In rare cases, it may take up to 8 hours to process the most recent sign ins.
trans-unit.target: In rare cases, it may take up to 8 hours to process the most recent sign ins.

trans-unit.source: You can find the most recent processed sign in by examining the help text at the top of each report.
trans-unit.target: You can find the most recent processed sign in by examining the help text at the top of each report.

trans-unit.source: Help text at the top of each report
trans-unit.target: Help text at the top of each report

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] For more documentation on Azure AD Reporting, check out [View your access and usage reports](active-directory-view-access-usage-reports.md).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] For more documentation on Azure AD Reporting, check out [View your access and usage reports](active-directory-view-access-usage-reports.md).

trans-unit.source: Getting started
trans-unit.target: Getting started

trans-unit.source: Sign into the Azure Management Portal
trans-unit.target: Sign into the Azure Management Portal

trans-unit.source: First, you'll need to sign into the [Azure Management Portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com) as a global or compliance administrator.
trans-unit.target: First, you'll need to sign into the [Azure Management Portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com) as a global or compliance administrator.

trans-unit.source: You must also be an Azure subscription service administrator or co-administrator, or be using the "Access to Azure AD" Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: You must also be an Azure subscription service administrator or co-administrator, or be using the "Access to Azure AD" Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to Reports
trans-unit.target: Navigate to Reports

trans-unit.source: To view Reports, navigate to the Reports tab at the top of your directory.
trans-unit.target: To view Reports, navigate to the Reports tab at the top of your directory.

trans-unit.source: If this is your first time viewing the reports, you'll need to agree to a dialog box before you can view the reports.
trans-unit.target: If this is your first time viewing the reports, you'll need to agree to a dialog box before you can view the reports.

trans-unit.source: This is to ensure that it's acceptable for admins in your organization to view this data, which may be considered private information in some countries.
trans-unit.target: This is to ensure that it's acceptable for admins in your organization to view this data, which may be considered private information in some countries.

trans-unit.source: Dialog box
trans-unit.target: Dialog box

trans-unit.source: Explore each report
trans-unit.target: Explore each report

trans-unit.source: Navigate into each report to see the data being collected and the sign ins processed.
trans-unit.target: Navigate into each report to see the data being collected and the sign ins processed.

trans-unit.source: You can find a [list of all the reports here](active-directory-reporting-what-it-is.md).
trans-unit.target: You can find a [list of all the reports here](active-directory-reporting-what-it-is.md).

trans-unit.source: All reports
trans-unit.target: All reports

trans-unit.source: Download the reports as CSV
trans-unit.target: Download the reports as CSV

trans-unit.source: Each report can be downloaded as a CSV (comma separated value) file.
trans-unit.target: Each report can be downloaded as a CSV (comma separated value) file.

trans-unit.source: You can use these files in Excel, PowerBI or third-party analysis programs to further analyze your data.
trans-unit.target: You can use these files in Excel, PowerBI or third-party analysis programs to further analyze your data.

trans-unit.source: To download any report as a CSV, navigate to the report and click "Download" at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: To download any report as a CSV, navigate to the report and click "Download" at the bottom.

trans-unit.source: Download button
trans-unit.target: Download button

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] For more documentation on Azure AD Reporting, check out [View your access and usage reports](active-directory-view-access-usage-reports.md).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] For more documentation on Azure AD Reporting, check out [View your access and usage reports](active-directory-view-access-usage-reports.md).

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Customize alerts for anomalous sign in activity
trans-unit.target: Customize alerts for anomalous sign in activity

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the "Configure" tab of your directory.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the "Configure" tab of your directory.

trans-unit.source: Scroll to the "Notifications" section.
trans-unit.target: Scroll to the "Notifications" section.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable the "Email Notifications of Anomalous sign ins" section.
trans-unit.target: Enable or disable the "Email Notifications of Anomalous sign ins" section.

trans-unit.source: The Notifications section
trans-unit.target: The Notifications section

trans-unit.source: Integrate with the Azure AD Reporting API
trans-unit.target: Integrate with the Azure AD Reporting API

trans-unit.source: See [Getting started with the Reporting API](active-directory-reporting-api-getting-started.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Getting started with the Reporting API](active-directory-reporting-api-getting-started.md).

trans-unit.source: Engage Multi-Factor Authentication on users
trans-unit.target: Engage Multi-Factor Authentication on users

trans-unit.source: Select a user in a report.
trans-unit.target: Select a user in a report.

trans-unit.source: Click the "Enable MFA" button at the bottom of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Click the "Enable MFA" button at the bottom of the screen.

trans-unit.source: The Multi-Factor Authentication button at the bottom of the screen
trans-unit.target: The Multi-Factor Authentication button at the bottom of the screen

trans-unit.target: Audit events

trans-unit.target: Learn about what events are audited in the directory in [Azure Active Directory Reporting Audit Events](active-directory-reporting-audit-events.md).
